self_predictions.prediction_summary: Devon believes he is in impeccable form and has the capability to beat Ermes, especially if the match is close in strength. He expects a positional fight with potential for the match to go into a hook or on the strap.
self_predictions.style_conflict: Positional fight with potential for hook or strap

Ermes Gasparini.strength: Very strong, especially in back pressure and wrist control
Ermes Gasparini.previous_match_summary: Ermes has shown great performances against top competitors like Dave Chaffee and Levan, demonstrating his versatility and strength.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Devon believes Vitalii can be the best and is incredibly dangerous, especially in a top roll match. He thinks Vitalii will win but acknowledges Revaz's strong hand and top roll abilities.

Vitalii Laletin.strength: Incredibly dangerous, especially in top roll
Vitalii Laletin.health: Some inconsistent performances but still very strong
Vitalii Laletin.previous_match_summary: Vitalii has had great matches but some not up to expectations.

Revaz Lutidze.strength: Incredible hand and top roll abilities
Revaz Lutidze.previous_match_summary: Revaz has shown strong performances, especially in top roll.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Engin describes Thomas Manghi as a high-quality top roller and Dustin Hyatt as a high-quality hook puller, setting up an interesting hook vs top roll match.

Thomas Manghi.previous_match_summary: Known for his top rolling skills.

Dustin Hyatt.previous_match_summary: Known for his hook pulling skills.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Engin believes Devon is at his strongest ever and that Ermes should be very concerned. He thinks Devon's physical and mental preparation will give him the edge.
third_party_predictions.style_conflict: Positional fight with potential for various techniques

Devon Larratt.strength: Strongest ever, especially in pronation and wrist control
Devon Larratt.health: Very healthy, both physically and mentally
Devon Larratt.previous_match_summary: Devon has shown incredible form in recent matches, including his performance against Dave Chaffee.

Ermes Gasparini.strength: Very strong, especially in back pressure and wrist control
Ermes Gasparini.previous_match_summary: Ermes has demonstrated versatility and strength against top competitors.
